name: jira-orchestrator
description: Arbiter (Spartan) - Intelligent Jira issue orchestration with GitHub Integration Suite. Features: (1) Incremental PR Strategy - prevents massive PRs through proactive size estimation and checkpoint PRs, (2) Smart Commits - auto-update Jira via commit messages with #comment, #time, #transition, (3) GitHub-Jira Sync - auto-link branches, PRs, and deployments, (4) Multi-Cloud Deployment Tracking - portable configs for AWS/GCP/Azure, (5) 6-Phase Protocol - EXPLORE → PLAN → CODE → TEST → FIX → DOCUMENT with auto-documentation.
